31.08.2011 GB SCR16685 Changed mask of invoice number (10 -> 20)
18.02.2009 GB SCR14411 Added two parameter for call GB101
01.10.2008 SH SCR14018 Button Confirm: Added module to book invoices
on special account
10.09.2008 GB SCR13942 Extended condition for bt. Confirm and changed
selection for task MarkSameInvoices (Ctrl+H)
17.06.2008 SH SCR13707 Changed resolution to 1024*768; added new fields to
screen; Changed selection of INVO rows; ect
08.02.2007 SH SCR12300 Enabled Ctrl+R for OMQ081 online screen
26.04.2006 AK SCR10924 added pi.HellerOfficeCode and pi.HellerSUBGroupCode
07.09.02005 JJ SCR8007 Changed call BSP012 to new version
12.05.2005 JJ SCR8170 added History to SCHI confirmation
11.11.2004 JJ SCR7305 cont. enhancements after test
09.11.2004 JJ SCR7305 added invoice confirmation handling
14.09.2004 JJ SCR6980 confirmation handling via BSP012
//04-06-2004 JP request JDO: change title for frame "...Confirmation Date"
14.04.2004 JJ SCR5972 added SILO_TRIGGER argument to call GB101
-changed SKIP_IBYH argument to logical
09.03.2004 JJ SCR5666 Added option to select some invoices of schedule
10.02.2004 JJ SCR5479 new handling confirmation (book if possible/needed)
05.02.2004 JJ SCR5238 (cont) -delete messae after confirm, no print via BMQ030
-- Shortcut handling
O = Online
Select OSP004C
maRk invoices
marK some Invoices
-- Read into v.Note using subroutine, see R.S.
Selects are to be kept as a set of 4 because the subroutine uses
a varcurr function
-- Set v.Note (using SCHT_EXPLANATION1 - 4 fields)
-- Split v.Note (explanation box) in up to 4 lines
maRk invoices
maRk invoices
After schedule confirmation or cancel return online
BSP012 result 0 = OK, 1 = Nothing to do, 2+ = Error
Always clear mult
Only call GB101 if invoice still conforms to criteria
Generate sequence number for MULT
